Ying Liu

Machine Learning | Data Visualization | Statistical Analysis | Cloud Computing | Project Management

Hi, I am a data scientist specializing in statistics, machine learning, and data preprocessing. I have strong programming skills in Python and SQL and experience developing predictive models and creating data-driven dashboards to support decision-making. I am passionate about using data to explore insights and drive business growth.
